wobani.component.light

Class BlinnPhongLightSources

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.component.light.BlinnPhongLightSources

  • public class BlinnPhongLightSources
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the Blinn-Phong light sources for the UBO.
